author: Francisco-Gamino
body: Skipping Get-PSSessionCapability and New-PSRoleCapabilityFile on help system tests since there is no help content for these two cmldets. See issue #2460.

comments.author: msftclas
comments.body:
Hi **@Francisco-Gamino**, I'm your friendly neighborhood Microsoft Pull Request Bot (You can call me MSBOT). Thanks for your contribution!

It looks like you're a Microsoft contributor (Francisco Gomez Gamino). If you're full-time, we DON'T require a Contribution License Agreement. If you are a vendor, please DO sign the electronic Contribution License Agreement. It will take 2 minutes and there's no faxing! https://cla.microsoft.com.

TTYL, MSBOT;
